function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Permeable zone between exterior and interior in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne particles and aerosols entering the living space","Mitigation":"Establishment of buffer or containment space to create an airlock and directional airflow from internal residential space to the containment area","Technologies":"Air purifiers, directional airflow systems","People":"Residents, visitors, delivery personnel","Owner":"Architects, building developers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Risk of virus deposits on items and clothing from external spaces","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious viruses into the home","Mitigation":"Disinfection protocols for items and clothing exposed to external spaces, implementation of delivery space containment measures","Technologies":"UV disinfection, contactless delivery systems","People":"Residents, delivery personnel","Owner":"Homeowners, delivery companies"}]}
